availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David M. Neely (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth Cruchfield Neely in Rutherford County, Tennessee, on November 16, 1848. Father of William M. Neely, and Rufus M. Neely. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, 443B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Potato Patch, p. 570.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 396A.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Rutherford County, 1804 - 1881: Marriages, p. 50.
